author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Caitlin Clark Has Been Named a Semifinalist for the Naismith Player of the Year Award
text: (Iowa City, IA) – Caitlin Clark has been nominated for multiple awards this season. Clark was just named a semifinalist for the 2024 Naismith Player of the Year Award. She recently won the award last season and was named a semifinalist for the award the season before as a sophomore. Clark has led the nation in points per game this season and in assists with 32 points and 8.6 assists per game this season.
